summary: Provides asynchronous reading and decoding of a single part of a multipart message, exposing helpers to access metadata such as the part name, filename, and charset, and to retrieve the content as raw bytes, text, or JSON while supporting chunked and line‑wise iteration.
business_intent: Facilitate server‑side handling of multipart/form‑data requests (e.g., file uploads and form fields) by offering a convenient API to read, decode, and interpret each individual body part.
